descriptionMdByRank.1:
Increases DEF by **16%**
Casting Resonance Liberation restores **8** points of Concerto Energy. This effect can be triggered once every 20s. When the wielder heals Resonators, increases Crit. DMG of all nearby Resonators in the team by **20%** for 4s. Effects of the same name cannot be stacked.
descriptionMdByRank.2:
Increases DEF by **20%**
Casting Resonance Liberation restores **10** points of Concerto Energy. This effect can be triggered once every 20s. When the wielder heals Resonators, increases Crit. DMG of all nearby Resonators in the team by **25%** for 4s. Effects of the same name cannot be stacked.

Casting Resonance Liberation restores **12** points of Concerto Energy. This effect can be triggered once every 20s. When the wielder heals Resonators, increases Crit. DMG of all nearby Resonators in the team by **30%** for 4s. Effects of the same name cannot be stacked.

Casting Resonance Liberation restores **14** points of Concerto Energy. This effect can be triggered once every 20s. When the wielder heals Resonators, increases Crit. DMG of all nearby Resonators in the team by **35%** for 4s. Effects of the same name cannot be stacked.

Casting Resonance Liberation restores **16** points of Concerto Energy. This effect can be triggered once every 20s. When the wielder heals Resonators, increases Crit. DMG of all nearby Resonators in the team by **40%** for 4s. Effects of the same name cannot be stacked.
